mapper.select: SELECT news_no,news_title,news_name,news_content,news_date,news_category,news_image,num FROM (SELECT news_no,news_title,news_name,news_content,news_date,news_category,news_image,rownum as num FROM (SELECT news_no,news_title,news_name,news_content,news_date,news_category,news_image FROM ORDER BY mno ASC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT mno,title,poster,director,actor,genre,grade, regdate,time,story FROM movie WHERE mno=#{mno}
SELECT title FROM movie WHERE LENGTH(title)>=2
SELECT poster FROM movie WHERE title = #{title}
